name: Dreidel Rat Slap
description:
Dreidel Rat Slap mostly follows the rules of Egyptian Rat Screw, but incorporates the use of a dreidel to use power ups! All you need is a deck of poker cards and a dreidel for everyone playing.

I designed this game to be part of the 2020 Dreidel Jam hosted by the IGDA Jewish Developers SIG.
